english.segment1: All I have in this world. Is more than a king could ever wish for. All these crowns leave me cold. For I was born to kiss Your feet
english.segment2: All I have in this life. Is all for a King, you know I live for. And Your crown bears my name. For I was born to give You praise
english.segment3: Isn't He beautiful. Isn't He beautiful. Isn't He beautiful
english.segment4: Take this life, take it all. I'm breathing the dirt, but I have clean hands. So I'll run with my boots on. For I was born to give You fame
